name: subsense
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a meaning of a word or phrase that is closely related to a more general meaning of the same word : The core sense can help you to understand other related subsenses. This sense has four sub-senses in the dictionary.
More examplesFewer examplesThe first three subsenses cover most occurrences of this word.Each of the main senses of the word is subdivided into sub-senses. It is important to understand the relationship between each subsense and the core sense under which it appears in the dictionary.
